bibl.title: On the So-called Monastery of the Armenians in Wādī Naṭrūn (Ancient Scetis).
bibl.note: General lay-out of the monastic buildings. - Description of the individual rooms 1-30. - The church (32-35). - The installations 36-49 to the East of the church.

bibl.title: Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie Copte

bibl.seg: Peter Grossmann, On the So-called Monastery of the Armenians in Wādī Naṭrūn (Ancient Scetis).
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 51 (2012) pp. 57-74, 5 pll.
General lay-out of the monastic buildings. - Description of the individual rooms 1-30. - The church (32-35). - The installations 36-49 to the East of the church.
